title: Sun in Pisces
summary: A season emphasizing permeability, endings, and integration. Attention turns to loose threads, emotional undercurrents, and what needs to be released or absorbed before the next cycle. The opportunity is to make space for transition rather than forcing new structure.

meaning.headline: Focus shifts toward endings, integration, and emotional undercurrents.

frames.text: Sun in Pisces emphasizes transition, permeability, and the need to process what has accumulated over time.
This period favors reflection, release, and gentle adjustments over aggressive new beginnings.
Sensitivity may increase as boundaries feel more porous.
Loose ends and unresolved feelings are more noticeable and ready to be addressed.
This requires passivity, withdrawal, or chaos.

frictions: Blurry boundaries around time, energy, or emotion
Escaping into distraction instead of processing
opportunities: Letting go of commitments that no longer fit
Making space for rest and integration
Listening to subtle signals and intuition
Tending to emotional and energetic backlog
Preparing quietly for an upcoming new cycle

do: Build in more room for rest and reflection.
Notice where you are carrying more than you need to.
Close loops gently instead of forcing conclusions.
Allow feelings and impressions to surface without immediate judgment.
Use softer structure to support transition.
avoid: Taking on others' emotions as your own
Forcing clarity before it is ready

reusable_lines.text: This is a time for integration and gentle release.
Rest can be part of the work of transition.

forbidden_claims: Deterministic statements about confusion or suffering
allowed_framing: Agency-forward framing: 'you can choose what to let go of…'
Contextual framing: 'if things feel softer or less defined…'
